extendedInfo.description: This is a free Justin Bieber app for true Beliebers! New version includes hot ripped tide photos of his abs on a boat with friends!Features:- Justin Bieber Wallpapers- Photos of Justin- Videos & Music- Memory Game- Photo sharing- Save to SD cardJustin Bieber Wallpapers gallery section of the app brings you much more than just plain wallpapers for your mobile phone or tablet! Each of the featured Justin Bieber photos has an inspirational quote from his life, interview, or a part of his song Lyrics (you'll get great response from your friends by sharing these pics on Facebook, Myspace etc). You can also share by sms or save the photos to your SD card, and of course set them up as wallpapers. These photos are yours to keep and galleries do not require internet connection.There is a True Beliebers Fan Zone tab below the galleries which opens up external sources of photos and videos, so you can watch Justin Bieber videos online (wifi recommended, possible on reg data plan too), pull photos from a Flickr stream (so the photos get updated without having to update the entire app.Wiki-bio:Justin Bieber (born March 1, 1994) is a Canadian pop musician, actor, and singer-songwriter. Bieber was discovered in 2008 by American talent manager Scooter Braun, who came across Bieber's videos on YouTube and later became his manager. Braun arranged for him to meet with entertainer Usher Raymond in Atlanta, Georgia, and Bieber was signed to Raymond Braun Media Group (RBMG), and then to an Island Records recording contract offered by record executive L.A. Reid.Bieber has received numerous awards, including both Artist of the Year Awards at the 2010 American Music Awards and the 2012 American Music Awards, and was nominated for Best New Artist and Best Pop Vocal Album at the 53rd Grammy Awards. With a global fan base, termed as "Beliebers", and over 33 million followers on Twitter, he was named by Forbes magazine in 2012 as the third-most powerful celebrity in the world. He had earned an estimated US$55 million in the previous 12 months. As of May 2012, Bieber has sold 15 million albums.--Please rate this app 5 stars, we will update and add more photos / quotes at least once a month!Ad-supported app (including periodic push notifications and icons ads), easy to remove.This application is brought to you totally free with the help of search monetization. We have opted to use this to be able to keep creating more free apps for you. Please note that with this app you will receive a few search points on your device, all are easily deleted or replaced. Thank you for your understanding.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Amazing!! Thanks I was searching for a non interent app songs since years!!
reviews.author: Maissan Elhifnawy
